entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
